windows.command: .\dep\vcpkg\bootstrap-vcpkg.bat && .\dep\vcpkg\vcpkg install --triplet x86-windows-static && cmake -B build -G Ninja -DCMAKE_BUILD_TYPE=Release -DCMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE="./dep/vcpkg/scripts/buildsystems/vcpkg.cmake" -DVCPKG_TARGET_TRIPLET=x86-windows-static && cmake --build build --config Release --parallel

linux.command: cp cmake/x86-linux-sm.cmake dep/vcpkg/triplets/x86-linux-sm.cmake && ./dep/vcpkg/bootstrap-vcpkg.sh -musl && ./dep/vcpkg/vcpkg install --triplet x86-linux-sm --debug && rm -rf build && cmake -B build -G Ninja -DCMAKE_TOOLCHAIN_FILE="./dep/vcpkg/scripts/buildsystems/vcpkg.cmake" -DVCPKG_TARGET_TRIPLET=x86-linux-sm -DCMAKE_CXX_FLAGS_INIT="-m32" -DCMAKE_C_FLAGS_INIT="-m32" && cmake --build build -j
